      • readPhylipFile

        public void readPhylipFile()
        Since:
        31/10/2011 Added methods to parse lines that include spaces within sequence lines. NOTE that this assumes rawInput has NO blank lines (before data, at least).

      • readFastaFile

        public void readFastaFile()
        Since:
        31/10/2011 RESOLVED: 31/10/2011: TODO testing revealing some very strange behaviour in some fasta reads. work out why. A number of errors - lastname and lastdata initialised wrongly to null not "" taxon names added as substr(1) not substr(1,length-1) so not now truncated (incidental) loadSequences() now takes boolean arg for line reporting MAJOR error: lastname was always being reinitialised after sequenceHash.add() to "", so half of the time e.g. some taxa names are ignored, and their data entered in the other taxa, doubling line length MAJOR error: the final taxon was never being added to sequenceHash as its match condition was not being filled.

                            boolean useOriginalTaxonNames)
        Parameters:

        useOriginalTaxonNames - - or the truncated sequence names hash (first 6 chars of original name + underscore + 3-digit padded UID)

      • simulateConvergenceInVariantSites

        public void simulateConvergenceInVariantSites(java.lang.String masterTaxon,
                                              java.lang.String[] taxaToForce,
                                              int numberOfSitesToConverge)
                                       throws TaxaAbsentFromAlignmentException,
                                              VariantSitesUnavailableException
        Purpose: constrain a subset of taxa to have the same AA

        execution: 

        for i in num sites{
        random indices
        get target master taxon as char array /// NB: codon triplets
        read array[indices]
        replace
}
        Parameters:
        masterTaxon - - The taxon that is being treated as the master. Sites will be converged to this taxon's sequence randomly
        taxaToForce - - The taxa that in which convergence is to be simulated.
        numberOfSitesToConverge - - The number of sites to be forced to converge.
        Throws:
        TaxaAbsentFromAlignmentException - - In cases where the taxaToForce are not present in the alignment (check case of taxa?)
        VariantSitesUnavailableException

      • initialiseTranslationHash

        public void initialiseTranslationHash()
        Initialise the translation hash (if it isn't instantiated already). Any codons not listed here will be translated as a gap '-' character.
        Since:
        21/08/2012
        See Also:
        translate(), removeStopCodonsInDNA()

      • initialiseExpandedTranslationHash

        public void initialiseExpandedTranslationHash()
        Initialises the 'MEGA expanded' translation hash (includes all ambiguity characters with unique expansions). Some of these codons include gaps - this is unorthodox behaviour. Any codons not listed here will be translated as a gap '-' character.

      • initialiseExpandedTranslationHashWithNoGapsInCodons

        public void initialiseExpandedTranslationHashWithNoGapsInCodons()
        Initialises the 'expanded' translation hash (includes all ambiguity characters with unique expansions, except any with gap character). None of these codons include gaps. Any codons containing gaps will be trainslated as a gap.

      • initialiseExpandedTranslationHashWithOnlyGapsInCodons

        public void initialiseExpandedTranslationHashWithOnlyGapsInCodons()
        Initialises the 'expanded' translation hash (includes only ambiguity characters with unique expansions and at least one gap character). ALL of these codons include gaps - this is unorthodox behaviour.

               throws SequenceTypeNotSupportedException
        Parameters:

      • filterForMissingData

        public void filterForMissingData(int filter,
                                 boolean filterByFactor)
                          throws FilterOutOfAllowableRangeException
        Parameters:
        filter - - either the number of missing taxa at any given site, or the proportion (0-100 out of 100) of taxa that are allowed to have missing data at any given site [e.g. if the ratio (gapped taxa/total taxa) > (filter/100), for any given site]
        filterByFactor - - false to just use number of taxa missing as the threshold, true to use proportions.
        Throws:
        FilterOutOfAllowableRangeException - The allowable filter bounds are: 0
        Since:
        0.0.1 r63/4

      • hasWholeNumberOfCodons

        public boolean hasWholeNumberOfCodons()
                               throws SequenceTypeNotSupportedException
        Returns:
        Boolean hasWholeNumberOfCodons - indicates whether no.codons/3 is an integer (whole codons) or not (partial codons)
        Throws:
        SequenceTypeNotSupportedException - A method that checks whether a whole number of codons are present, e.g. if (this.numberOfSites/3) has a remainder (% > 0) This method should throw a SequenceTypeNotSupportedException if AA or UNDEFINED sequence types are used
        Since:
        21/08/2012

      • simulateConvergenceInInvariantSites

        public void simulateConvergenceInInvariantSites(java.lang.String masterTaxon,
                                                java.lang.String[] taxaToForce,
                                                int numberOfSitesToConverge)
                                         throws TaxaAbsentFromAlignmentException,
                                                VariantSitesUnavailableException
        Purpose: constrain a subset of taxa to have the same AA

        execution: 

        for i in num sites{
        random indices
        get target master taxon as char array /// NB: codon triplets
        read array[indices]
        replace
}
        Parameters:
        masterTaxon - - The taxon that is being treated as the master. Sites will be converged to this taxon's sequence randomly
        taxaToForce - - The taxa that in which convergence is to be simulated.
        numberOfSitesToConverge - - The number of sites to be forced to converge.
        Throws:
        TaxaAbsentFromAlignmentException - - In cases where the taxaToForce are not present in the alignment (check case of taxa?)
        VariantSitesUnavailableException

      • forceTranslationIgnoringSequenceType

        @Deprecated
public void forceTranslationIgnoringSequenceType()
                                                      throws SequenceTypeNotSupportedException
        Deprecated. Debug only.
        Forces the alignment to be translated ignoring which sequence type has been assumed. Debug only.
        Throws:
        SequenceTypeNotSupportedException
